soulsweapons.weapon.no_collected_souls: There were no bound allies to collect!
soulsweapons.weapon.no_freyr_sword: There is no Freyr Sword bound to you!
soulsweapons.weapon.on_cooldown: Can't cast this ability with the Cooldown effect!
soulsweapons.weapon.no_soulbound_weapon: There is no 'Soulbound' weapon bound to you!
item.soulsweapons.chungus_disc: 大型蠢古斯 音乐唱片
death.attack.true_magic: 多亏了魔法，%1$s以光速融化了
death.attack.dragon_mist.player: %1$s couldn't breathe in %2$s's concentrated Dragon Mist
tooltip.soulsweapons.magic_damage_descri: - 当目标高于§c33%生命值§r时，造成基于§6火焰附加等级§r
的额外§9魔法伤害§r，该伤害无视对方护甲。
tooltip.soulsweapons.blazing_blade_descr: - 击中时点燃目标，使其长时间受灼烧伤害，
tooltip.soulsweapons.life_steal_descript: - 满蓄力时击中目标可§c回复生命§r
tooltip.soulsweapons.overheal_descriptio: - 满生命值给予§e护盾§r而非治疗
tooltip.soulsweapons.omnivamp_descriptio: - 根据§5技能§r击中的目标数为使用者§c回复生命§r
tooltip.soulsweapons.sword_slam_descript: - 蓄力后跃起，随后猛击地面造成范围伤害
tooltip.soulsweapons.flame_enraged_descr: - 造成火焰伤害时获得§4力量§r效果
tooltip.soulsweapons.haste_description: - §9横扫之刃§r将提升§6急促§r的效果
tooltip.soulsweapons.ghost_summoner_desc: - 杀死亡灵生物后概率召唤§3使魂§r
tooltip.soulsweapons.shield_description: - 副手使用以获得§d抗性提升§r与§6伤害吸收§r效果
tooltip.soulsweapons.obliterate_descript: - 蓄力后猛击前方造成范围伤害
tooltip.soulsweapons.off_hand_flight_des: - 在副手时给予使用者§3激流§r效果
tooltip.soulsweapons.returning_descripti: - Press keybind to return the thrown weapon to yourself.
- Damage and effects trigger on collision on the way back.
Walking over it will auto pick it up. Returning keybind:
tooltip.soulsweapons.lightning_descripti: - 副手使用时蓄力以释放§e雷击§r
tooltip.soulsweapons.moonlight_attack_de: increase the firerate of the projectiles.
tooltip.soulsweapons.pure_moonlight_desc: - 蓄力后向不同方向释放三道§3月光波§r
tooltip.soulsweapons.dragon_staff_descri: - 发射§5纯净龙息§r，龙息对敌人
造成伤害时，将会治疗使用者。
tooltip.soulsweapons.vengeful_fog_descri: 喷射龙息对敌人造成伤
tooltip.soulsweapons.wabbajack_descripti: - 发射给予随机效果的随机投掷物
tooltip.soulsweapons.galeforce_descripti: - Press ability keybind to §fDash§r a direction,
firing an arrow at the player's last attacked
target, dealing up to §c100%§r more damage based
on the target's missing health. If no target
is present, shoots an arrow in front instead.
tooltip.soulsweapons.meridias_retributio: - 击杀§5亡灵生物§r有概率引发能造成伤害、
震慑周围§5亡灵生物§r、并使其着火的爆炸。
tooltip.soulsweapons.soul_trap_descripti: - 击杀生物将收集其灵魂
tooltip.soulsweapons.soul_release_descri: - 用于召唤带有力量效果的集怨体
集怨体种类基于召唤它的灵魂种类
tooltip.soulsweapons.soul_release_wither: - 使用收集的灵魂释放§4凋灵之首§r
每第三次释放将会发射§f充能凋灵之首§r
tooltip.soulsweapons.collect_1: Press V by default to collect the souls of your bound
tooltip.soulsweapons.collect_2: summons back into your Soul Harvesting Weapon if in hand.
tooltip.soulsweapons.collect_3: This includes everything from Remnants to the Soulmasses.
tooltip.soulsweapons.lunar_herald_descri: 在攻击时额外发射月光波
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_crown_descrip: - 装备以获得对§5腐朽§r的免疫力
tooltip.soulsweapons.reversal_1: - Flip any §charmful§r status effect you get
tooltip.soulsweapons.reversal_2: with a third of the duration and half of
tooltip.soulsweapons.reversal_3: the amplifier when not on cooldown.
tooltip.soulsweapons.reversal_4: Default effect if no opposite is found is regen.
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_robes_descrip: - 装备使附近所有生物§5凋零§r
tooltip.soulsweapons.freeze_description: - 对所有攻击到的敌人施加§b永冻之触§r
tooltip.soulsweapons.permafrost_descript: - 杀死敌人会使其化为冰柱后爆炸
对周围敌人造成伤害，并施加§b永冻之触§r
tooltip.soulsweapons.heavy_throw_descrip: - 扔出斧头，冻结所有被击中的敌人
tooltip.soulsweapons.crit_description_1: - 以少于§c20%生命值§r的生物为目标时
tooltip.soulsweapons.crit_description_2: 掷出的矛伤害变为§6两倍§r
tooltip.soulsweapons.disable_heal_descri: 使敌人在一段时间内无法回复生命
tooltip.soulsweapons.skofnung_stone_desc: - 使用时移除§5诅咒之伤§r效果
同时对§f绝佳之剑斯考夫农§r强化
tooltip.soulsweapons.sharpen_description: - 使用§5绝佳之石§r将强化该武器
使其获得更高的攻击力，并且攻击命中时
tooltip.soulsweapons.mjolnir_lightning_c: - 潜行时使用将会猛击地面
伤害周围的怪物并召唤§e雷击§r
雷击将以玩家为中心向四周扩散
tooltip.soulsweapons.mjolnir_throw_descr: - 命中敌人时，若其上方没有
遮挡物，则会引来天雷轰击对方
tooltip.soulsweapons.freyr_sword_descrip: - 使用后将会召唤§b弗雷之§r
绑定）或右键点击剑将会
将其收回背包中按下其它的按键
（需绑定）可以切换其行动模式
tooltip.soulsweapons.freyr_sword_note_1: Return keybind is R by default, stationary keybind
tooltip.soulsweapons.freyr_sword_note_2: is Z. Keybinds can be edited in controls at any time.
tooltip.soulsweapons.freyr_sword_note_3: Only one Freyr Sword entity may excist at a time.
tooltip.soulsweapons.freyr_sword_note_4: Quitting the game will permanently place it on that
tooltip.soulsweapons.freyr_sword_note_5: spot until someone picks it up and bounds to it again.
tooltip.soulsweapons.arkenplate_descript: - 当使用者低于§c50%生命值§r时
tooltip.soulsweapons.arkenplate.aftersho: - Upon taking damage while under §c50% Health§r,
trigger an explosion that knocks away enemies
When infused, affects targets with §3Weakness II§r.
tooltip.soulsweapons.arkenplate.mirror.1: - When your health is less than
tooltip.soulsweapons.bane_of_arthropods_: - 增加对§3节肢动物§r的伤害
tooltip.soulsweapons.featherlight_descri: 羽毛的同时又力达千钧
tooltip.soulsweapons.doom_description_2: 攻击将会造成巨额伤害
tooltip.soulsweapons.transformation_desc: - 杀死生物将会收集§b蓝色§r或者§c红色§r灵魂
其颜色取决于生物是否使用远程攻击，或者是否敌对
收集的每一个灵魂都会提高武器一定的攻击力
当灵魂收集完成时，武器将会变化
变化后的形态取决于每种§b灵§r§c魂§r的数量
变化后的武器将会继承附魔属性
tooltip.soulsweapons.early_combat_descri: - 在战斗的前几秒中增加伤害与移
速，持续时间可以在配置中更改。
tooltip.soulsweapons.umbral_trespass_des: 入目标的灵魂当离开时，
对目标造成巨量的伤害
Will target last mob hit. Nothing happens if no mob has
been hit within certain time or is already dead.
You must also be within a certain range of the target.
tooltip.soulsweapons.trick_weapon_descri: - 使用按键可以切换武器的形态
默认按键是B，可以在设置中更改
tooltip.soulsweapons.heavy_weapon_descri: - Gain §6Haste§r post hit while having §4Strength§r effect.
- Landing with §fCalculated Fall§r effect triggers a
unique ground detonation based on held weapon.
- Base §fPosture Loss§r applied on targets is multiplied by %s
tooltip.soulsweapons.righteous_descripti: - 攻击§f亡灵§r时，基于火焰附加等级造成额外伤害
tooltip.soulsweapons.detonate_spears_des: - 主手持握时，按下对应键将猛击地面，对附近的敌
人造成伤害，并且引爆所有先前掷出的§6德罗普尼尔长矛§r
§6矛§r。每一把存在的§6德罗普尼尔长矛§r将会提升1.0威力。
当威力超过2，将会对附近的所有敌人施加§3虚弱§r。
- Pressing while sneaking summons 8 §6Draupnir Spears§r from
the sky around the player instead.
tooltip.soulsweapons.keybind_ability: Ability Keybind is LEFT_ALT by default, can be changed in controls.
tooltip.soulsweapons.moonfall_descriptio: - 蓄力后释放一次猛击，使用月光
轰击并击碎前方直线上的敌人伤害。
附魔的等级将会提升有效距离。
tooltip.soulsweapons.charge_description_: 当前§b充能%§r & 每次攻击§b充能§r:
tooltip.soulsweapons.need_charge_descrip: - 这把武器需要§b充能§r以使用能力
使用后，将会失去所有§b充能§r
tooltip.soulsweapons.charge_bonus_damage: - Having charge increases base damage to a limit.
tooltip.soulsweapons.lunar_herald_no_cha: Having the Lunar Herald effect removes the need
for charge and reduces the ability cooldown.
tooltip.soulsweapons.parry_description_1: While this is in off-hand, press keybind
tooltip.soulsweapons.parry_description_2: to attempt a parry to §cPosture Break§r an
tooltip.soulsweapons.parry_description_3: opponent that tries to damage you.
tooltip.soulsweapons.parry_description_4: Parry Keybind is RIGHT_ALT by default,
tooltip.soulsweapons.nights_edge_descrip: - Use to summon a line of §dEdges of Night§r.
- Press keybind to summon a circle of
tooltip.soulsweapons.veil_of_fire_descri: - Press ability keybind to unleash §dMeridia's Retribution§r
and apply §6Veil of Fire§r effect on yourself that will
continuously apply fire damage to nearby mobs.
tooltip.soulsweapons.blight_description_: increasing by §f1§r each hit. At amplifier
based on the target's armor amount.
tooltip.soulsweapons.fast_pull_1: - Pull speed is increased for this weapon.
tooltip.soulsweapons.fast_pull_2: - Pull speed is increased for this weapon by
tooltip.soulsweapons.slow_pull_1: - Pull speed is reduced for this weapon.
tooltip.soulsweapons.slow_pull_2: - Pull speed is reduced for this weapon by
tooltip.soulsweapons.third_shot_3: True damage is reduced against other players by
tooltip.soulsweapons.arrow_storm_1: - Send out a storm cloud that rain down
tooltip.soulsweapons.gun_posture_loss_on: Only %s of it is applied on players
tooltip.soulsweapons.withered_armor.unce: - Use ability keybind to gain §5Life Leach§r.
target has a damage over time effect.
tooltip.soulsweapons.withered_armor.infe: - While enhanced, also set the target on fire.
tooltip.soulsweapons.armor.set_bonus.for: - Heal whenever an entity dies near you
tooltip.soulsweapons.epic_fight.crouch_r: With Epic Fight mod, use while crouching instead of off-hand.
tooltip.soulsweapons.lord_soul_purple.pa: A rare form of souls, thought to be extinct.
It's dark, but balanced color, suggests
the user has lived for centuries.
tooltip.soulsweapons.lord_soul_void.part: Soul of an ancient one, corrupted by dark
soul energy that would turn any sane soul to
a mindless husk, immune to the passage of time.
tooltip.soulsweapons.lord_soul_red.part_: Soul of the old, forgotten demon king. Even
when the heart was cursed with decay, his
soul never gave in as his undying hatred
tooltip.soulsweapons.lord_soul_rose.part: A combination of many lost souls. What is
strange is how many of these souls are
tooltip.soulsweapons.lord_soul_dark.part: The last will of the old champion resides
§o'Put me back. Let me protect my people.'§r
tooltip.soulsweapons.lord_soul_white.par: True soul of the old champion. So
tooltip.soulsweapons.lord_soul_day_stalk: Deity of the daylight. Long ago, a group
of ancients prayed to her and her sister.
tooltip.soulsweapons.lord_soul_night_pro: Deity of night and dark. She promised
godhood if she was summoned. Destruction
and annihilation was what she gave.
tooltip.soulsweapons.essence_of_eventide: You feel a strong sense of longing, as if it
desperately wants to return to something.
tooltip.soulsweapons.shard_of_uncertaint: It seems to perfectly fit in a certain pedestal...
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_orb.1: All the colors of light and dark pass through
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_orb.2: this orb. Throw it into the sky to summon
tooltip.soulsweapons.demon_heart.part_1: At first contact, the ancient race befriended
tooltip.soulsweapons.demon_heart.part_2: the demons, knowing only in secret how
tooltip.soulsweapons.demon_heart.part_3: powerful the demon heart truly was.
tooltip.soulsweapons.lost_soul.part_1: It didn't take long for the discovery
tooltip.soulsweapons.lost_soul.part_2: of soul energy after the ancients
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_crown_lore_1: The ancients chose a scholar to be the intermediary
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_crown_lore_2: between the ancients and the demons. Trust was built
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_crown_lore_3: between him and the demon king, and he came to be
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_crown_lore_4: known as the Scholar of the Basal, the greatest ally.
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_robes_lore_1: Blinded by desperation as a mortally wounded
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_robes_lore_2: man, all the scholar could think of was the
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_robes_lore_3: potential for immortality through his curse
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_helm_lore_1: Despite being immortal, the curse eats
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_helm_lore_2: away at your mind. The scholar would
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_helm_lore_3: soon forget who he was and what he was
tooltip.soulsweapons.withered_demon_hear: There is no beating, there is no blood. As the
demon race was cursed by a great artifact long
ago, all life had been drained, yet so much
tooltip.soulsweapons.moonlight_greatswor: A greatsword originally made for the Herald
of Moonlight, the great guardian of the
tooltip.soulsweapons.arkenstone.part_1: It is unknown how the Arkenstone came to be. Nevertheless,
tooltip.soulsweapons.arkenstone.part_2: it inherits the unique ability to contain close to infinite
tooltip.soulsweapons.arkenstone.part_3: amounts of soul energy. In theory, that energy could fuel a
tooltip.soulsweapons.nightfall.part_1: A weapon made by twisting lost souls with
tooltip.soulsweapons.nightfall.part_2: dark energy. Wielding it would cause any
tooltip.soulsweapons.nightfall.part_3: sane being to be blinded by power.
tooltip.soulsweapons.arkenplate_lore_1: One fateful night, the Arkenstone was stolen
tooltip.soulsweapons.arkenplate_lore_2: by a group of fanatics, ripped out of the
tooltip.soulsweapons.arkenplate_lore_3: iron titans shell. As a result, the old
tooltip.soulsweapons.essence_of_luminesc: The old champion could only listen in
horror from his tomb as his people were
tooltip.soulsweapons.withered_chest.lore: Distraught by the thought of being manipulated
throughout all these years, the king confronted
his former friend. Little did he know, the end
of the demon race drew near.
As the heart and aegis is filled with new
vigor and power, the heart faintly beats
enchantment.soulsweapons.fast_hands.desc: 减少枪械与弓的准备时间（模型不会改变）
enchantment.soulsweapons.visceral.desc: 提升银质子弹的架势击破概率，弓类武器效果减半
enchantment.soulsweapons.stagger.desc: 概率暂时大幅减速目标
key.soulsweapons.freyr_sword_stationary: 切换弗雷之剑行动模式
key.soulsweapons.collect_summons_soul_re: 收回灵魂收割者召唤物
advancements.soulsweapons.root.title: 类魂武器
advancements.soulsweapons.root.descripti: 独一无二的成就等你解锁！
advancements.soulsweapons.moonstone.desc: 获得月光石——比钻石更璀璨夺目的宝石！
advancements.soulsweapons.bluemoon_tools: 制造那把需要用到最好的宝石的武器，它现在还需要一些源动力…
advancements.soulsweapons.moonlight_tool: 加强武器，使其达到最佳状态
advancements.soulsweapons.lord_soul.desc: 获得一个王的灵魂——来自久远存在的残念
advancements.soulsweapons.bloodthirsty.d: 在携有渴血状态时使用饮血剑
advancements.soulsweapons.nightfall.desc: 获得夜陨，制造属于你自己的亡灵军团！
advancements.soulsweapons.lords_on_stick: 制造一根龙之法杖——其紊乱的力量与凋零的瓦巴杰克相当
advancements.soulsweapons.rageblade.desc: 获得鬼索的狂暴之刃，让敌人节节退败！
advancements.soulsweapons.dragonslayer_s: 获得一柄猎龙剑枪。它的力量来自天堂！
advancements.soulsweapons.whirligig_sawb: 获得旋转切割刀，让你的敌人灰飞烟灭！
advancements.soulsweapons.blunderbuss.de: 制造一把猎人喇叭枪，爆炸越强，威力越大！
制造一把猎人手枪，简单，致命的武器。
advancements.soulsweapons.gatling_gun.de: 制造一把加特林。好好看着吧，你的弹夹将在瞬间告罄。
advancements.soulsweapons.cannon.title: 也许有点做过头了？
advancements.soulsweapons.cannon.descrip: 制造一把猎人加农炮并对准一只小麻雀...开炮！
advancements.soulsweapons.all_weapons.de: 获得本模组内所有可制造的传说武器
advancements.soulsweapons.draugr_boss.de: 击败古英雄以及占据他残念的生物
advancements.soulsweapons.verglas.title: 伪造之水
advancements.soulsweapons.verglas.descri: 获得雾凇石，一种冰冷、光滑的材料，似乎有一些特殊的液体被困在里面。
advancements.soulsweapons.dream_on.title: 天马行空
advancements.soulsweapons.dream_on.descr: 因为精心设计的下落效果，在直坠50米的情况下活下来。
advancements.soulsweapons.moonknight.des: 将日暮精粹物归原主，并击败接下来出现的，如神明般的存在。
advancements.soulsweapons.trickweapon.de: 获得你的第一把变形武器：一种能够转变为其他形态的武器！
advancements.soulsweapons.transform_scyt: 通过向暗裔镰刀献祭足量的灵魂来将它转化为更强力的类型。
advancements.soulsweapons.kill_day_night: Use the Chaos Orb to summon the Day Stalker and Night Prowler, and acquire either of their souls.
advancements.soulsweapons.arkenplate.des: Craft the Arkenplate and become stronger than diamonds
advancements.soulsweapons.hallowheart.de: Craft the Hallowheart and reject the withering
